TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidationPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ValidationPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項用來識別驗證屬性 (Property) 的中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to identify a validation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常用於以 form 為基礎的輸入控制項。This attribute is typically used for form-based input controls. 如需屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別建立自訂控制項時。The following code example demonstrates using the class when creating a custom control. [!code-csharp[ValidationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/CS/validationpropertyattribute1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValidationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/VB/validationpropertyattribute1.vb#1)]
